summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Redness Solutions Soothing Face Cleanser is a non-drying cream cleanser that melts away makeup and impurities.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor any skin with occasional or persistent redness.Cleanser melts away makeup and impurities.Probiotic Technology includes Clinique's patented lactobacillus extract.Use the Clinique Redness Solutions regimen to see an improvement in visible redness: cleanse with Soothing Face Cleanser, comfort with Daily Relief Cream, protect with Daily Protective Base. A consistent, non-irritating routine helps get redness under control.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSLSSLESSulfatesFragranceItem 2157846How To UseUse face cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Lather between palms with tepid water.Massage over face.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Clinique Redness Solutions Daily Relief Face Cream With Probiotic TechnologyIngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate / VP Copolymer, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'Orge, Sucrose Stearate, Sea Whip Extract, Cholesterol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria), Acetyl Glucosamine, Lactobacillus Ferment, PPG-20 Methyl Glucose Ether, Caffeine, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Stearic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Green 5 (CI 61570), Blue 1 (CI 42090).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use face cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Lather between palms with tepid water.Massage over face.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Clinique Redness Solutions Daily Relief Face Cream With Probiotic Technology

reviews.headline: I always use this!!
reviews.comments: The best ever to treat my rosacea!!

reviews.headline: Game changer!
reviews.comments: I have been diagnosed with rosacea, and this product gets rid of nearly all my redness. My dermatologist is so impressed! I use it along with the Redness Solutions moisturizer. My skin looks great! The product is a little pricey but I feel it's worth it.

reviews.headline: I would buy again!
reviews.comments: I love the Clinique red solution face cleaner, helps tone down my redness and leaves my skin soft.

reviews.headline: Smooth cleaning
reviews.comments: I'm in my mid-50s and don't need harsh abrasives in my cleansers. I follow this up with the Redness Solutions lotion.

reviews.headline: Helps with rosacea and rednessüôèüèº
reviews.comments: After years of trying different products for my rosacea, this one finally did the trick. This cleanser feels good on my face and actually reduces my rosacea rashes. A definite repurchase.

reviews.headline: Go To Cleanser!
reviews.comments: My favorite cleanser ever I have sensative skin as well rosacea and it helps my redness so much! Not greasy, unscented, cooling, gentle, does not have suds (which I really love) and doesnt strip my skin!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I love Clinique Redness Solutions Soothing Face Cleanser for my sensitive skin. It definitely calms the redness on my face and makes your skin feel and look good.  It is the best product around if you have rosacea!!

reviews.headline: The BEST I HAVE USED
reviews.comments: I have VERY SENSITIVE SKIN ü•∫  This is a must buy it calms the red tint to my skin & doesn't burn me ...

reviews.headline: Gentle, no effect on redness
reviews.comments: bought the travel set that includes the face wash, moisturizer and sunscreen routine. I was very hopeful it would treat my redness but after 2 months of using it daily twice a day it did nothing for me. The cleanser is very gentle and cleans the face well but again paying this much for a cleanser isn't worth it.

reviews.headline: It works for me!
reviews.comments: I have always had issues with moisturizers and face cleansers. Pretty much went through too many to say. I used this one as a last resort, and I'm glad I did. My face has always been red, and has ALWAYS burned when using cleansers or creams. This one keeps my face soft all day, doest burn at all. Each person to their own, I just happen to love this one

reviews.headline: absolutely not
reviews.comments:
I purchased this as a trio with the other redness skincare line. They caused hives, BURNING my skin and it's still red...and itchy (thanks Clinique). 

I have rosacea acne and this is such a misleading miserable product.

reviews.headline: Have bought this product for many years.
reviews.comments: This product helps keep my Rosecia under control.

reviews.headline: No more red, melts makeup onto your face
reviews.comments: Takes red away but does not remove makeup! It just smears makeup all over! Like rubbing oil all over your face!

reviews.headline: I will continue buying this to remove my makeup
reviews.comments: I wash my make up off with this! Works very well. I don't know why they said it doesn't clean because it does!

reviews.headline: Not For My Rosacea and Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I have rosacea and sensitive skin. First few days this worked ok. While my skin didn't really feel clean or remove makeup, it did initially reduce the redness. Then after a few days my face got redder and started to itch. I stopped using and the issues stopped. I wasn't sure what to make of that because Clinique is known for making products for sensitive skin without fragrance. I had never had an issue with another product from them and use several. I even waited a few months and tried again. Same thing.

reviews.headline: Yes would use again
reviews.comments:
Face clearer tones down redness 
Skin feels smooth

reviews.headline: Did not work!
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin and have been looking for any sort of skincare product that won't leave my skin red, dry or irritated. When I went to Ulta to explore the skincare section the employee heavily expressed that this would help relieve and take away any redness or irritation. However, it did the opposite. The first few times I used it, it was great, but as I kept on using it the product was making my face red and irritated each time I applied. In my opinion, I would save your money and keep exploring because if you have sensitive skin like me, this product probably won't work.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: This cleanser is what I've been searching for. I'm in my 40's w/normal skin and redness in my cheeks. This cleanser feels so clean and lightweight when using it. It does help with the redness. A little goes a very long way. No strong smell.

reviews.headline: Actually Works
reviews.comments: I rarely post reviews, but this formula has been a lifesaver. I recently started getting rosacea on my face. I've tried a lot of products before landing on this product. I use this in conjunction with the Redness Solutions Daily Relief Cream. I have been using these two products as directed 2x a day for the past 5 days, and I am astonished by the result. I wish I would have taken a before picture, but this product is amazing, and does actually work.

reviews.headline: Doesn't Work
reviews.comments: Honestly, I was recommended this months ago by one of the clinique workers at the store. I expressed my concern and she recommended this. I obviously gave it a few months to see how it worked. NO RESULTS. Honestly, I feel like it hasn't helped and hasn't helped cleanse my skin. My acne is worse than it was before and my redness hasn't been helped at all. I'd rather try to find something else since it seems this doesn't work AT ALL.

media.headline: Love it; overpriced for small bottle.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used many products which claim they won't harm my sensitive skin -- and they have left me with burning/tingling skin. I have Rosacea and haved used this product for the past 6 months and can't say enough wonderful things about it. It has reduced the redness, has not made my face feel tight or caused a burning sensation. I LOVE it! I use this in conjunction with the Redness Solution Daily Relief Cream. It is a great combination for my skin. I tell anyone who will stand still long enough about how wonderful these two products are -- even my husband has noticed the difference!! And that is amazing! Thank you for the great products you provide.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Cleanser for Sensitive Red Skin

faceoff_negative.comments:
I did the "live chat" with the Clinque website to ask about why my face didn't feel clean nor seem to get all my make up off with the REDNESS solutions cleanser ( I dont wear foundation, only their redness powder)...and here is what clinique said...

"I'm sorry. Actually, our skin needs a higher level of cleansing at night to remove not only makeup and sunscreens, but also perspiration, pollution, soil and excess oil than you need in the morning when we need a lighter level of cleansing. So for the cleanest skin possible and to allow your Redness Solutions Cleanser to effectively cleanse the skin, it's best to use a makeup solvent to break down the makeup and sun block first."

"It cleanses the skin of the perspiration, pollution and excess oil that is on the skin during the day but with the long wearing makeup technology available, you need a makeup solvent at night first to help remove it. For one product to provide the same level of cleansing both morning and night could cause over cleansing of the skin which can lead to irritation."

SO for those of you wondering why you cant get your foundation off... this isn't designed for make up remover at all.

Hope this is helpful!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not irritating but not really CLEANING skin
